00010 #include <QVBoxLayout>
00011 #include <QHBoxLayout>
00012 #include <QLabel>
00013 
00014 FileNameEditor::FileNameEditor(QWidget *parent,
00015                                                            const QFileInfo& baseLocation,
00016                                                            const QString fileName,
00017                                                            const QMap<QString, QString>& attributes): 
00018 QGroupBox(tr("File name and path"), parent), 
00019 nameEdit_(this, baseLocation, fileName), 
00020 attributes_(this) {
00021 
00022         // the layout for the name label and name line edit
00023         QHBoxLayout* nameLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00024 
00025         // create the label
00026         QLabel* nameLabel = new QLabel(tr("Name:"), this);
00027         nameLabel->setToolTip(tr("The name field contains an absolute or relative\n"
00028                 "path to a file name or directory"));
00029         nameLayout->addWidget(nameLabel, 0);
00030         nameLayout->addWidget(&nameEdit_, 1);
00031 
00032         // the top layout for the whole widget
00033         QVBoxLayout* topLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00034 
00035         topLayout->addLayout(nameLayout);
00036         topLayout->addWidget(&attributes_);
00037 
00038         // set the attributes for the attribute widget
00039         attributes_.setAttributes(attributes);
00040 
00041         nameEdit_.setProperty("mandatoryField", true);
00042 
00043         // connect the signals informing of content changes.
00044         connect(&nameEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)),
00045                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00046         connect(&nameEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)),
00047                 this, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00048         connect(&attributes_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00049                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00050 }
00051 
00052 FileNameEditor::~FileNameEditor() {
00053 }
00054 
00055 QString FileNameEditor::getFileName() const {
00056         return nameEdit_.text();
00057 }
00058 
00059 const QMap<QString, QString> FileNameEditor::getAttributes() const {
00060         return attributes_.getAttributes();
00061 }
00062 
00063 void FileNameEditor::setFileName( const QString& fileName ) {
00064         nameEdit_.setText(fileName);
00065 }
00066 
00067 void FileNameEditor::setAttributes( const QMap<QString, QString>& attributes ) {
00068         attributes_.setAttributes(attributes);
00069 }
00070 
00071 bool FileNameEditor::isValid() const {
00072         // both eidtor widgets must be in valid state
00073         return (nameEdit_.isValid() && attributes_.isValid());
00074 }
